channel.title: Need Comunity Ideas
channel.description:
I am working on my server for noobs and i am adding an add on system. So far for commands i added addItem sendMessage teleportToX teleportToY heightLevel Spawn Npc next to you and a check of playerRights to see if they can do the command What else should i add?
Added: AddXp combat requirement --
atObject Handler
[size=10pt][b] CLOSED[/b][/size]

Spawn Npc next to you
and a check of playerRights to see if they can do the command
